qub: Chay gueshya jogucun gueshyaycajpa lausan ichicllapis chayashuptiqui.
Karullaman witikuy. Togaynin mana chayashunaykipaj ishkay metruchöna kankiman.
Juc runa gueshyaykajta, gosuykajta u wishgaykajta rikar kayno rurankiman:
Shimi chapakunata goy. Chaura chay runaga gosur y wishgar jukta mana joguchinganachu.
Capas payga gueshya jogunanta mana munar chapakuykan.
Wakinga gueshyaykashan mana musyakanchu. Ichanga gueshyata joguchishunqui.
Chaymi ama aywashunchu achka runakuna kaykashanman. Mana musyanchichu maygan gueshyaycashanta.
Aybësi gueshyaykaj runapa lausan chayanman kaykunaman:
Chay kösakunta mana musyaypa yatarkur shimikita yataptiki...
Chay gueshyataga wañuchinki jabunwan mayllar u alcohol nishanwan kupakur.
Chay gueshyaga achka hörami kösakuna janancho kawan.
Käraykita ama yataychu, ni jukpatapis. Yatakuyta munarga sumajraj makikita mayllakuy.
Achka junaj chayllata charaptikiga chay chapakuna gueshyata ruriman yaykuchinmanmi.
Shimikita chapakushayki ganra kaptinnaga basüraman jitariy. Juc junajllami üsankiman.
Jukwan ama mañanakuychu cucharata, pusilluta. nï toallatapis.
Kukushnikiwanga manami käraykita yatayta kamäpakunkichu may-jina munarpis.
Punkuta u ventanata kichay makiwan mana yatayllapa.
Achca jabunwan makikitaga mana gongaypa mayllakuy.

Masllata willaparkushayki: Kaycho willapaykäshushayki sumajmi yanapäshunki tukuy gueshya mana jogushunaykipaj: wishga, gosu.  Waran-waran mayllakushun gueshya mana kaptinpis. Kay willakuy casha COVID19 gueshyapita 28 de febrerukama musyashantami.
